name: Great AI Escape
description:
First Ludum Dare competition entry. Theme: Start with nothing

You are an AI core that snuck into an enemy base, and now has to escape.

Controls:

Movement - Keyboard Arrow keys, WASD, or Mouse control

Fire - Shoots main weapon (Left CTRL or Mouse 0)

Alternate Fire: Hack the ship in front of you (Left ALT or Mouse 1)
